text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump 😂 WOW It’s an eye-opening experience The coronavirus has given me. I now realize the people in POWER/TOP OF THE LADDER are totally incapable OR uneducated to hold the positions they have. All I hear is excuses, no planning, no Organization or leaders 🤨🤦🏻‍♀️
